title: The Grafting
description: Brigham, Taylor and their friends have done the impossible, escaping Harrow and the evils it contained. But their struggles are far from over. Arriving in Union, a seemingly perfect society where people enjoy complete freedom, the group quickly discovers that nowhere is safe. Problems from the past resurface as Brigham struggles to understand who he really is. When he finds his life on the line once again, he must decide who he trusts, and who is trying to get him killed.
author: Sam Skidmore
